page.title: 01THE MORETON & LEASOWE AREA
page.content:
This block is made up of the area around {Moreton}and{Leasowe.}Moreton is slightly west and more inland than Leasowe, which is on the north coast of the {Wirral Peninsula}.
Moreton has quite a large shopping area, centred on {Moreton Cross},which forms a junction of two main roads. The Moreton area is made up of private and council housing estates.
Leasowe has a large leisure centre and is noted for{Leasowe Castle}and { {Leasowe Lighthouse}, both of which are of local historic interest.
{Cadbury Typhoo}and{Squibb's}both have factories in the Moreton/Leasowe area.
The area is very low lying and a sea wall protects it from flooding.
